thread.title: Body piercer cuts off little finger because she thought it would ‘look good’
thread.title_full: Body piercer cuts off little finger because she thought it would ‘look good’

author: tmeyjes
title: Body piercer cuts off little finger because she thought it would ‘look good’
text:
Toby Meyjes for Metro.co.uk Thursday 23 Feb 2017 9:52 pm 
WARNING: Graphic content below Body piercer Torz Reynolds cut off her own finger because she wanted to (Picture: Facebook) 
Body modification artists are used to pushing the boundaries, but Torz Reynolds may have gone further than most. 
The 30-year-old from Essex chopped off her finger with bolt cutters last week detailing the countdown to her thousands of followers on Facebook . Man sends girlfriend bouquet of 'flowers' made of £1,100 in bank notes 
Why? We hear you ask. Well, it’s for no better reason then she thought it would ‘look good’. 
And the body piercer seems impressed with the results, posting this week that the wound was ‘healing so well and totally love it.’ 
If she looks familiar it’s because it’s not the first time Torz has hit the headlines, having previously sliced off a tattoo with a scalpel and sent it to her ex-boyfriend. Torz Reynolds cut off her finger with bolt cutters (Picture: Facebook) She said the wound is healing well (Picture: Facebook) 
Unsurprisingly, not everyone has reacted to the finger severing with excitement and some have questioned whether the event actually took place. 
But the pictures do look real (and gruesome) enough and she is adamant that it did take place. 
On one post, she explained: ‘I do these things for myself. It’s not hurting ANYBODY else. 
‘I chose to document them on Facebook because I want to share the experience with my friends.’ A post shared by Torz Reynolds (@torzibabes) on Feb 10, 2017 at 7:07am PST A post shared by Torz Reynolds (@torzibabes) on Feb 14, 2017 at 3:17am PST More
